version_description:
What's new:
1. A few bugs fixed;
2. Introduce Facebook share and invite;
3. Introduce contact service.
4. Add iCloud service,synchronizes your game data to iCloud.

Increase KT play forum.
1. Defender can communicate and discuss our game with global players!
2. If can't pass some levels, get strategies at here!
3. More activities at here!
4. Make more congenial friends at here!

This app has been updated by Apple to use the latest Apple signing certificate.

New Update:
1.Increase Floating ice theme(level 101-115)
2.Increase Iceland theme(level 116-135)
3.New carrot!
